info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Powell County through 615 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Deer Lodge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Avon and Elliston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 178 and 190. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass near mile marker 5, near mile marker 7, and between mile markers 10 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
